NOTE. --Where a word ends in a consonant, there is often a slight vowel sound like the short modified ii in Tamil. This vowel is hardly noticeable in singing or reciting and it has therefore been omitted, e.g., the first three words should strictly be transliterated thus:--Appangii Dandii.
